meanings.definition: A work of outstanding artistry or skill.
meanings.sent1: The painting was a true masterpiece of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist proudly displayed her masterpiece at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The masterpiece of a cake was devoured in minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her dance performance was a masterpiece of grace and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The intricate sculpture stood as a masterpiece of creativity and talent.

meanings.definition: A person's greatest piece of work.
meanings.sent1: His latest novel is considered his masterpiece by many critics.
meanings.sent2: The chef's signature dish is truly a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke was a masterpiece of humor that had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her final project in art class was a masterpiece that impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The inventor's latest creation was hailed as a technological masterpiece.
